Class CommonGameBoard

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameBoard, org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MazeBoard

    public abstract class CommonGameBoard
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
implements GameBoard
    This is an abstractic class that implements from gameBoard and includes the combined data members for all gameBoards
    Since:
    2015-06-15
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sarusi Ran, Gershfeld Itzik
